title: Niobrara National Scenic River: Calendar
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Calendar            Calendar           Keyword       By Date     Start Date      End Date          Search         Upcoming Events    Showing 2 results    Show ALL instances of recurring events   RSS Feed      Niobrara National Scenic River Junior Ranger Program      Time: 10:00 AM Location: Smith Falls State Park Fees: Free with $5 State Park entry fee     Sunday, August 14, 2016 Every Sunday Weekly  from 06/12/2016 to 08/28/2016 Kids 6-12 (though all ages are welcome!) can join a park ranger for a hands-on program to discover some of the special things about the Niobrara NSR. Topics vary per week. View Details      Niobrara National Scenic River Kids' Activity in the Visitor Center      Time: 8:30 AM to 4:30 PM Location: Niobrara National Scenic River Visitor Center Fees: Free     Saturday, August 20, 2016 Every Saturday Weekly  from 06/04/2016 to 09/03/2016 Kids are invited to stop by the Niobrara NSR Visitor Center (214 W. Highway 20, Valentine) during normal hours for hands-on activities that will help them explore the Niobrara NSR. View Details            What's Happening at Niobrara? Special events kick off in April with Outdoor Family Fun Day followed by the spring River Cleanup in May.  Early June brings National Trails Day. June also marks the beginning of ranger-led interpretive talks and guided hikes for the summer season. Look for rangers on the river, too. We are there to offer assistance, information or insight as needed.       Kids try their hand at canoeing during the annual Outdoor Family Fun Day. NPS Photo/Kristen Maxfield
